name: Space Race!
description:
Its been a decades since the last invasion taking things that didnt belong.

We are ready, now its our turn to claim back and show them scavengers. 
Are super powerful racing stripped, rocket fulled, spitfire car will give no mercy. 
We are here to fight, to stop the invasion and to force the scavenges 
back into the depths of the abyss. LETS GET READY TO RACE!!

Try not to destroy the local neighborhood ;)

Instructions:

Drive the space car using A for left and D for right and Space Bar to fire the space car cannon! 

Tools:

To develop this game we have used Unity 2017, Maya and Magicavoxel.

Team:

Programming: John Bennett

Artwork and Animation: Tony Findley
